subject: Antitrust Laws and Competition Issues
Scholarships and Fellowships
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Several changes, including the N.C.A.A.'s decision not to ask student-athletes to sign statements allowing promotional use of their likenesses, come amid growing unrest over the amateur model of college sports.
snippet: Several changes, including the N.C.A.A.'s decision not to ask student-athletes to sign statements allowing promotional use of their likenesses, come amid growing unrest over the amateur model of college sports.
